021
022import java.lang.reflect.Method;
023import java.util.Arrays;
024
025import org.apache.fulcrum.security.model.turbine.TurbineAccessControlList;
026import org.apache.turbine.annotation.AnnotationProcessor;
027import org.apache.turbine.annotation.AnnotationProcessor.ConditionType;
028import org.apache.turbine.annotation.TurbineRequiredRole;
029import org.apache.turbine.pipeline.PipelineData;
030import org.apache.turbine.util.RunData;
031
032public class PlainJSONSecureAnnotatedScreen extends PlainJSONScreen
033{
034
035    /**
036     * This method overrides the method in JSONScreen to perform a security
037     * check prior to producing the output.
038     *
039     * @param pipelineData Turbine information.
040     * @throws Exception a generic exception.
041     */
042    @Override
043    public void doOutput(PipelineData pipelineData) throws Exception
044    {
045        if (isAuthorized(pipelineData))
046        {
047            super.doOutput(pipelineData);
048        }
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * Use this method to perform the necessary security check with Turbine annotations {@link TurbineRequiredRole} in
053     * a newly overridden {@link #doOutput(PipelineData)} method.
054     *
055     * @param pipelineData Turbine information.
056     * @return <code>true</code> if the user is authorized to access the screen, by default it is required ACL is populated.
057     * If {@link TurbineRequiredRole} is not set, it is allowed by default
058     * @throws Exception A generic exception.
059     */
060    protected boolean isAuthorized(PipelineData pipelineData) throws Exception {
061        RunData data = pipelineData.getRunData();
062        Method[] methods = getClass().getMethods();
063        // if the method passes the filter, it is authorized
064        return Arrays.stream(methods).filter(m ->
065                        m.getName().equals("doOutput"))
066                .takeWhile(m ->
067                        data.getACL() != null)
068                .findFirst()
069                .filter(m ->
070                        AnnotationProcessor.isAuthorized(m, (TurbineAccessControlList<?>) data.getACL(), ConditionType.ANY))
071                .isPresent();
072    }
073}
